note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from pregnancy or maternal conditions
subtitle: Estimated annual death rate from [maternal conditions](#dod:maternal-mortality) per 100,000 people. This includes late maternal deaths that occur up to 1 year after the end of pregnancy.

display.name: Deaths that are from maternal disorders per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged age-standardized
